articles.author: Zack Sharf
articles.title: Jimmy Kimmel Says ‘I Did Get Italian Citizenship’ Because Trump’s Presidency ‘Is as Bad as You Thought It Was Gonna Be. It’s So Much Worse’ - Variety
articles.description: Is Jimmy Kimmel planning to leave America because of Donald Trump? He has obtained Italian citizenship because Trump is so awful.
articles.content: Is Jimmy Kimmel preparing to leave the United States amid Donald Trump‘s presidency? Perhaps not given his work commitment to ABC’s “Jimmy Kimmel Live,” but he’s certainly giving himself an exit plan… [+2295 chars]
